page.title: 14HAINAULT FOREST
page.content: The main function of the place is recreation -{11}football pitches,{4} cricket tables and two{18} hole golf courses. There is a fishing lake and even a horse ride. There are specially provided tracks. There are{6}ponds. More people come on Sundays. There have been very large fires which have caused alot of damage. If they have a hot summer there are lots of fires, but if there is a wet summer there aren't so many. Hainault Forest is an open space, containing deciduous woodland, grassland and semi-arable land, situated on a bed of London clay. There are many species of tree in Hainault Forest, the oak and beech being the most common. Other trees include the Ash, Birch, Hornbeam, Hawthorn and Holly.
